text: The Overseas Manpower Corporation Limited has announced that personal interviews for recruitment of machine operators for a private company in Oman would be held at the District Employment Office in Tiruchi on March 6. Candidates with a pass in SSLC and relevant experience can appear for the interview to be held from 9 a.m. Those in the age group of 22 to 32 can participate, a release said. For more details, dial 044-22505886/22502267 or visit www. omcmanpower.com — Special Correspondent
title: Recruitment for a company in Oman
